## nobug
[![PyPI version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/nobug.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/nobug/)

## introduction

佛祖保佑 永无bug


With this package, you can get the bless from The Buddha!!!

Bugs will not disturb you, so you can enjoy your life.

## install
```
$ pip3 install nobug
```

## usage

```
import nobug

# write your own code
```
